data.eml:eml: Synopsis of the Japanese species of Aleocharinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae), with review of the type specimens I. Tribes Himalusini and Leucocraspedini

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maruyama, Munetoshi, Yamamoto, Shûhei, Eldredge, Taro K. (2014): Synopsis of the Japanese species of Aleocharinae (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae), with review of the type specimens I. Tribes Himalusini and Leucocraspedini. Zootaxa 3887 (3): 393-400, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3887.3.6
